text.autoconfig.leaves_us_in_peace.title: Leaves Us In Peace Configuration
text.autoconfig.leaves_us_in_peace.optio:
Leaves ignore leaves of other types when
determining whether to decay or not

Leaves ignore logs of other tree types when
determining whether to decay or not

Leaves ignore persistent leaves (placed by player)
when determining whether to decay or not

Random delay between leaves decaying and updating nearby leaves.
Has no effect if 'Accelerate leaves decay' is 'No'.

Minimum random delay.
Set minimum equal to maximum to eliminate randomness.

When leaves decay, update leaves diagonal
to them in addition to those adjacent to them
Create particles and sounds when leaves decay
Download translations from Crowdin when the game launches
text.leaves_us_in_peace.no_config_screen: Leaves Us In Peace Configuration Unavailable
Install Cloth Config to enable configuration.
